courses.title: Amazon Music Clone
courses.description: Amazon Music is a streaming service offering millions of songs, playlists, and albums, with options for ad-free listening, offline downloads.

courses.title: Twitter Clone
courses.description: A front-end clone of Twitter featuring the core functionalities like posting tweets, following users, and a feed display.

courses.title: 2048-Game
courses.description: 2048 is a challenging sliding puzzle game where players combine numbered tiles to reach the 2048 tile while strategizing to maximize their score.

courses.title: Pixel Pen
courses.description: A live coding environment where users can write HTML, CSS, and JS, and see the output in real-time with a reset button.

courses.title: Movie-Deck
courses.description: Movie Deck is a dynamic platform offering curated movie recommendations with personalized ratings and reviews.

courses.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
courses.description: Tic Tac Toe is a classic two-player game where participants take turns marking Xs and Os on a 3x3 grid, aiming to align three of their symbols in a row, column, or diagonal.
